text: وَقَدْ مَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرَهُمْ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكْرُهُمْ وَإِن كَانَ مَكْرُهُمْ لِتَزُولَ مِنْهُ ٱلْجِبَالُ

translation.en.sahih: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya mereka telah membuat makar yang besar padahal di sisi Allah-lah (balasan) makar mereka itu. Dan sesungguhnya makar mereka itu (amat besar) sehingga gunung-gunung dapat lenyap karenanya.
